data.name: Delet AI Chatbot Development
data.description: üí¨ Led the development of an advanced AI chatbot using GPT-4 and GPT-3.5-turbo models, integrated with MongoDB for context-aware responses. Improved system accuracy by 35%, reduced errors by 50%, and achieved a 40% reduction in response times. Implemented multi-turn conversation handling and dynamic context switching, boosting query resolution by 45% and reducing escalation to human agents by 60%, driving cost savings.

data.name: HR AI - Automated Resume Screening and Interviewing
data.description: ü§ñ Built an AI-driven system that automates the entire recruitment process. From resume screening, keyword detection, to conducting and assessing AI-based interviews, the system efficiently ranks and shortlists candidates using LLMs, streamlining the hiring workflow.

data.name: Automated Question Type Coding for Forensic Interviews
data.description: üî• Led the development of an automated forensic interview question coding system, achieving 82-98% accuracy across question types using a fine-tuned RoBERTa model from HuggingFace. Applied oversampling techniques to enhance model performance and human-machine agreement.

data.name: Drug Molecule Effectiveness Prediction with Enhanced GNNs
data.description: üî¨ Developed a model to predict drug molecule effectiveness using enhanced GNNs, simulating drug interactions including Drug-Target, Drug-Drug, Drug-Catalyst, and Drug-Solvent interactions. Combined multiple datasets and leveraged multimodal GNN architectures to improve predictive accuracy.

data.name: Text Based Image Retrieval via Low-Resourced Indic Languages
data.description: üì¶ Contributed to an image retrieval system for low-resource Indic languages, implementing a Siamese network with triplet loss. Achieved 2% better accuracy than benchmarks, with 68.83% for English and 66.66% for Hindi models, utilizing MuRIL for text embedding.

data.name: Constellation: An End-to-End Machine Learning Platform
data.description: üåÄ Played a key role in developing an MLOps platform, cutting model deployment time by 70%. Directed the creation of a user-friendly SDK, and implemented key features like model versioning, automated testing, and performance monitoring, improving accuracy by 50%. Utilized AutoML to accelerate model selection and hyperparameter tuning by up to 75%.

data.name: Stock Application
data.description: üìà Developed a stock search application using the Finnhub API to allow users to search for stock ticker symbols. Implemented features like autocomplete suggestions and stock detail pages, utilizing AJAX for asynchronous data retrieval and Node.js for server-side operations.

data.name: Meta University - VR Development
data.description: üéÆ Spearheaded the creation of Meta University, a VR school in Unreal Engine, resulting in a 30% increase in student engagement and a 40% reduction in classroom learning time. Integrated personalized avatars, leading to a 25% boost in student satisfaction, and enhanced retention rates by 50% through immersive educational experiences.

data.name: Three.js Portfolio
data.description: üåê Created a dynamic portfolio website using Three.js for 3D visualizations, showcasing projects and skills. Implemented interactive elements to enhance user engagement and improve the overall presentation of my work.

data.name: Russia-Ukraine Twitter Sentiment Analysis
data.description: üïäÔ∏è Conducted sentiment analysis on English tweets related to the Russia-Ukraine conflict. Cleaned and processed data using NLP techniques, visualized sentiment distribution globally with geolocation data, and provided insights into public opinion.

data.name: Helmet and Number Plate Detector
data.description: ‚öôÔ∏è Developed a prototype using YOLOv5 that achieved 78% accuracy in detecting helmet-less riders and extracting number plates, utilizing object detection for precise helmet recognition and PyTesseract OCR for text extraction.

data.name: Foreign Object Debris (FOD) Detection on Runways
data.description: üöÄ Researched FOD detection using CNN-based object detection and segmentation techniques, exploring millimeter-wave and radio wave technologies. Presented findings in a seminar, effectively communicating advancements in FOD detection approaches.

data.name: Book Recommendation System
data.description: üìö Developed a book recommendation system using collaborative filtering. Processed user, book, and rating data to create a K-Nearest Neighbors model with cosine similarity, deployed using Streamlit for user-friendly interaction.
